name: Front Raise With Bands
instructions: Stand on the center of a resistance band with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Hold the handles with an overhand grip, arms hanging down in front of your thighs.
Keeping your arms straight (or with a slight bend in the elbows), lift the handles forward and up until your arms are parallel to the floor.
Pause for a second at the top of the movement.
Slowly lower your arms back to the starting position.
Repeat for the recommended number of repetitions.
